question: Which multinational bank allows customers to check certain banking information through Facebook Messenger?
explanation: Citigroup has rolled out a service that allows customers to check certain banking information through Facebook Messenger, the American banking giant revealed to CNBC. The service, a conversational computer program - or chatbot - is available to Citi's consumer banking clients in Singapore beginning Thursday. A spokeswoman said the bank plans to roll out the service in Hong Kong and Australia later this year before moving onto other markets in which Citi operates.
